About

Staying up to date with current front-end technology while sticking with what works. Always curious to try new tech and apply different approaches. I find the process of creating functioning web applications consistently rewarding.

What I Do:

Create responsive web pages with html, css, and javascript.

Build REST API's and user interfaces with React and NodeJS.

Configure databases such as MongoDB or SQL

Collaborate with others

Choose the right tools for the right project

Deploy and maintain web apps
